attributes.review: As a republican, I was APPALLED by the disgusting reviews left on Trumps app, however, that was until I downloaded it... The app practically ruined my phone, bringing up pop ups of low budget phone apps when I just want to admire the Cheeto 😩! This repulsive experience has driven me to join the side of the liberals 😊 (also the leaving of bad reviews is a form of protest before y’all get mad at these reviews 🙃)
attributes.title: The reviews were actually true 😔

attributes.review: This app gave me COVID-19 from it being such a virus. So I did the only logical thing I could think of and injected myself with 🧚🏼disinfectant🧚🏼 that solves the problem immediately and I am now virus free!🥰 I could not have done it without the help from our bigot of a “president” anyways the disinfectant ended up giving me other problems and is now eating my internal organs so therefore I rate this app 1 star✌🏼
attributes.title: Extremely disappointed

attributes.review:
“So when we have a lot of cases, I don't look at that as a bad thing. I look at that as, in a certain respect, as being a good thing because it means our testing is much better.

“So I view it as a badge of honour. Really, it's a badge of honour.

“In another sense, I tested positively toward negative, right? So no. I tested perfectly this morning, meaning I tested negative. But that's a way of saying it. Positively toward the negative.”
attributes.title: I loved reading Trump’s thoughts on COVID🥰

attributes.review: i wish there was a zero star option because WOW, downloading this app was a waste of my time. i never leave reviews on apps, but i had to speak up on how terrible that app is. when i opened the app, i was automatically greeted by a hot cheeto with a toupee. the whole app functions terribly, and this cheeto pops up way too many times. after leaving this review i am deleting this trash can of an application IMMEDIATELY.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP! WASTE OF TIME!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see if I could vote but instead I saw a whole bunch of irrelevant people there was a man claiming to be the president and I was astonished to see so many lies also the man claiming to be the president has sexual harassed lots of women and gotten away with it I can’t believe he’s trying to run a whole country sad to see people actually support a gremlin like him it’s disgusting and degrading but this is ameikkka so I’m not surprised
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: I got the app thinking🧠 that I would be able to see ALL the updates📩 on the election and stuff🙏🏻 BUT NO✋🏻 I OPENED THE APP📲 AND A HORRIBLE EXTREMELY INAPPROPRIATE❌ PICTURE📸 CAME UP‼️ I almost cried😢 it was the annoying orange🍊I thought that “meme”🤣 was dead years ago🙄 AND THE WHOLE APP HAD PICTURES OF IT🔞 horrible😱 I cant believe that Apple🍎 would allow🆘 this type of app📱to be on the app store🏬 I DELETED IT IMMEDIATELY 🙄 never going back🙈💅🏻 very disappointed🙁 at Apple 🍏
attributes.title: I ALMOST WENT BLIND

attributes.review: I downloaded the app hoping to keep up to date on the president and the state of the country. However, only moments after I downloaded the app, my phone glitches horribly and then burst into flames. I had to go and buy a new phone just to leave this review. But I figured I should save the people as quick as I could. Please do not download the app, your phone will get a bug
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: i wanted to get this app because i am a really reaaaly good 🧚🏼dump🧚🏼 supporter 😌 but when i opened the app, it possessed me and made me throw up all over the place. my cat 🐱 was shocked and went into the bathroom to grab the toilet 🥵 to help me throw up. i reached for water but quickly realized that the app poisoned it 😱! i really wish i could say that this was fake 😔 but it was all real... i barely made it out alive 😩 i was very lucky 🍀 that my cat was there.....
attributes.title: IT TRIED TO KILL ME

attributes.review: This app is horrible. I can’t believe it. I can’t believe that people actually like this Cheeto looking cotton candy bleached haired man. Every time i see his face he makes me want to astral project into the sky and never come back. He talks like he is the most powerful person in the whole world. But life isn’t even real and he’s just a hologram of our imagination. btw rip trump I won’t miss you😭😻🙀🐓😎
attributes.title: You made me lose my horse

attributes.review: I downloaded this app out of curiosity although I kinda nervous due to the horrible reviews but the reviews were right. This is a horrible app and caused my phone to lag. At first I thought it was only the app itself but it made my whole phone crash on every app I went on. Why would the president allow such a app? Horrible horrible app. Do not download.
attributes.title: Completely ruined my phone
